name: Phone Tycoon
description: This is an original clicker game about phones. Lots  of powerful upgrades for huge fun. You can also save progress.  Photy- best clicker game for fun and practice. Enjoy the estate you create in game. Grow and glorify your business! (I hope I set all variables to default LOL) Made using Godot engine (powered by GodotEngine : Copyright (c) 2007-2016 Juan Linietsky, Ariel Manzur. ) There is no licence stopping you from editing or sharing game Phone Tycoon but it is my work so I can start a process against anyone who tries to violate the fact that the work is provided "as is"- you may not pretend Phone Tycoon is your work. In the above notice, "I" means the creator or creators of the content downloadable from this page and "Phone Tycoon" is the Content mentioned above.  Author(s): Maj Zore
